comment: Its a really great app :) its super useful

title: Extremely Accurate!
comment: Very reliable and saves me a lot of time.

title: Very useful for me!
comment: When I first came across this app, I thought it was just an ordinary app just like other ttc apps out there needing data to actually get the bus time and etc. However with this app, I can just send messages and get the time of the bus at a specific time! Not to mention the design is very simple and easy to follow. I am thrilled to use this app when I am leaving to school now! Definetely 5/5 app!
